job_title: .Net/React Developer- MUST BE LOCAL TO DALLAS, TX
job_description:
This role doesn't accept c2c candidates or candidates that need sponsorship now or in the future- meaning no h1b/cpt/opt. only US Citizen or GC

Hybrid in Irving, TX

We are seeking a skilled .NET/React Developer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in both backend development using .NET Core and frontend development with React.js. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and implement backend services and APIs using .NET Core.
• Develop and maintain modern, responsive user interfaces using React.js.
• Work closely with product owners and stakeholders to define project requirements and timelines.
• Participate in full software development life cycle (SDLC) including requirements, development, testing, and deployment.
• Optimize applications for maximum speed, performance, and scalability.
• Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
• Collaborate with QA teams to ensure robust testing and smooth deployment.
• Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure innovative solutions.

Required Skills:
• 3+ years of experience with .NET Core development.
• 2+ years of experience with React.js
• Experience with Azure cloud environment.
• Proficiency with C#, ASP.NET, and MVC architecture.

Preferred:
• Experience in building and consuming RESTful APIs.
• Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6/ES7).
• Knowledge of database management systems (e.g., SQL Server, PostgreSQL).
• Experience with Git for version control and collaboration.

Qualifications: The ideal candidate will have strong experience in both backend development using .NET Core and frontend development with React.js
3+ years of experience with .NET Core development
2+ years of experience with React.js
Experience with Azure cloud environment
Proficiency with C#, ASP.NET, and MVC architecture
Responsibilities: You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
Design and implement backend services and APIs using .NET Core
Develop and maintain modern, responsive user interfaces using React.js
Work closely with product owners and stakeholders to define project requirements and timelines
Participate in full software development life cycle (SDLC) including requirements, development, testing, and deployment
Optimize applications for maximum speed, performance, and scalability
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Collaborate with QA teams to ensure robust testing and smooth deployment
Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure innovative solutions

job_description:
APN Consulting has an immediate need for a direct client requirement:

Job Title : React Developer
Location: Dallas, TX
Duration : 12 Plus Months

Job Description: We are seeking a skilled Frontend Developer with expertise in React and TypeScript to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for building user-friendly and efficient web applications. You will collaborate with designers and backend developers to create seamless user experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain responsive web applications using React and TypeScript.
• Implement state management and component lifecycle methods effectively using React Hooks.
• Collaborate with UX/UI designers to translate design wireframes into high-quality code.
• Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
• Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
• Work closely with backend developers to integrate APIs and improve overall application performance.

Must-Have Skills:
• 5 Plus years of strong experience in React and React Hooks.
• 4 Plus years of solid experience with TypeScript.
• Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.

Good to Have Skills:
• Familiarity with React Query and React Router for state management and routing.
• Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest and Cypress.
• Knowledge of MSW (Mock Service Worker) for API mocking.
• Understanding of Webpack for module bundling and optimization.
• Experience with GraphQL for API interaction.
• Familiarity with Axis for HTTP requests.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
• Proven experience in frontend development, particularly with React and TypeScript.
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

Qualifications: The ideal candidate will have a passion for building user-friendly and efficient web applications
5 Plus years of strong experience in React and React Hooks
4 Plus years of solid experience with TypeScript
Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Familiarity with React Query and React Router for state management and routing
Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest and Cypress
Knowledge of MSW (Mock Service Worker) for API mocking
Understanding of Webpack for module bundling and optimization
Experience with GraphQL for API interaction
Familiarity with Axis for HTTP requests
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Proven experience in frontend development, particularly with React and TypeScript
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently as well as part of a team

job_description:
About the role:
Work from home with top U.S. software companies and earn in U.S. dollars. At Turing, we are looking for React.js developers who will be responsible for the entire web development process and deliver highly scalable, customer-centric, and performant web applications.

About Turing.com:
Turing’s mission is to unleash the world’s untapped human potential. We use AI to source, evaluate, hire, onboard, and manage engineers remotely (including the HR and compliance aspects) in a bigger platform that we call the “Talent Cloud”.

We recently achieved unicorn status with a valuation of $1.1B, after raising over $140M in financing over four rounds of funding. 900+ companies including companies like Johnson & Johnson, Pepsi, Dell, Disney +, and Coinbase have hired Turing developers.

Responsibilities:
- Design & build scalable APIs by writing clean, efficient, and reusable code
- Create components, and implement pages and flows designed using UI/UX designers
- Develop highly efficient user interface components
- Contribute or suggest new initiatives to help your team make innovative choices
- Design, develop, review & test apps in collaboration with cross-functional teams
- Analyze, control, and improve the quality of the code

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
- 3+ years of web development experience (rare exceptions for highly skilled candidates)
- Proficiency in React.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
- Experience with REST APIs, third-party libraries & full life cycle of web development
- Fluency in English to collaborate with engineering managers
- Work full-time (40 hours/week) with a 4-hour overlap with US time zones
- Ability to write clean, reliable, and highly maintainable code

Preferred skills:
- Experience in cross-browser compatibility and the responsive design of applications
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
- Expert understanding of server-side logic and front-end performance optimization
- Experience in Unix/Linux environments, including basic commands and scripting
- Experience with project management and working directly with clients
- Experience writing unit test cases will be an advantage

What we offer:
- Elite U.S. Jobs
- Long-term, full-time opportunities
- Flexibility to work from anywhere in the world
- Better compensation
- Career growth
- Exclusive Developer Community
- Upskilling workshops
- Career development sessions
- Networking meetups
- Referral programs

Once you join Turing, you'll never have to apply for another job!

Qualifications: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
3+ years of web development experience (rare exceptions for highly skilled candidates)
Proficiency in React.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Experience with REST APIs, third-party libraries & full life cycle of web development
Fluency in English to collaborate with engineering managers
Work full-time (40 hours/week) with a 4-hour overlap with US time zones
Ability to write clean, reliable, and highly maintainable code
Responsibilities: Design & build scalable APIs by writing clean, efficient, and reusable code
Create components, and implement pages and flows designed using UI/UX designers

job_description:
This role is not open for C2C. Ideal for W2/1099 Contracts only

Candidate must be local to Michigan

This resource position will be supporting the MDOT Development program. As a frontend developer, responsibilities include but not limited to working with development project teams, UI/UX designers and Business analysts to develop and maintain reusable UI components that are accessible, performant, scalable, and robust. Must be familiar with WCAG 2.1, ADA compliance and responsive design. All development will be tested by the developer for accessibility using Jaws reader along with multiple browser plugins.

Strong background with React.js. Required, 5 years.

Experience with HTML5 and CSS Frameworks. Required, 5 Years.

Strong knowledge and background with ADA, WCAG 2.1, Section 508 compliance policies, User Experience design principles and standards. Required, 5 years.

Experience programming in projects using JPA framework. Required, 2 Years.

Experience programming in projects using current Spring framework. Required, 2 Years.

Experience programming with Spring Boot and Spring Data. Required, 2 Years.

Experience programming with Java 8+. Required, 3 Years.

Experience participating as a programmer within an Agile development environment. Required, 2 Years.

Experience programming in the JBOSS Enterprise environment. Desired, 2 Years

Nisha Miriam George,

job_description:
Job Title: React Developer with Spark, Scala, Airflow, and GCP Experience with 6+ years of experience

Location: Bentonville AR

Job Type: Full-time/Contract/Hybrid

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled React Developer with experience in big data technologies, including Spark (not PySpark), Scala, Airflow DAGs, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). The ideal candidate will have a unique combination of front-end expertise with React.js and backend knowledge, particularly in distributed computing and cloud-based environments. You will be responsible for building scalable web applications while working closely with data engineering teams to manage and optimize data pipelines.

Eligibility:

Must have work authorization to work in the US.

Accept OPT, CPT, EAD, GC or US Citizens only.

No C2C or H1B sponsorship for this position.

Hire Type - Only W2.

Duration - 12+ Months (Possibly extends further)

Number of Positions - 2

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Pay: Up to $45.00 per hour

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Pay: $40.00 - $50.00 per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Benefits:
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Paid time off

Schedule:
• Weekends only

• Please specify expected rate and work authorization status

• React: 5 years (Required)
• UI development: 5 years (Preferred)

• Use Responsive Web Design (RWD) techniques in web development: review mocks, bring them to life on desktop and connected devices

front-end work they do with Java Script, CSS3, HTML5, jQuery ,ReactJS and NodeJS is for a Java-based web application

• Experience with designing and building REST APIs
• Experience with front-end knowledge: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript(ex: Angular)
• Experience with multiple O/S's: Windows, UNIX/Linux platforms.
• BS/BA or higher in Computer Science or related field
• Android/iOS experience a plus
• Goal oriented and self-motivated.
• Candidate must have the ability to work independently or within a team environment.
• Strong oral and written communications skills with ability to create software design and engineering documents.
• Ability to multi-task and deliver high quality work under tight deadlines is essential.
• Ability to work in a fast paced environment is crucial.
• Ability to learn, excel and deliver at a quick pace is required.

job_title: UI React Developer (W2 Only, any VISA) || Chicago, IL - Hybrid Onsite
job_description:
Hi,

This is Namrata from HYR Global Source, I'm a staffing specialist and trying to reach you for below position with one of our clients:

Role: UI React Developer

Location: Chicago, IL - Hybrid (3 days onsite/week)

Duration: 12+ Months Contract + Extension

W2 Only, any VISA...

UI React Developer

The Senior UI Developer will represent the Digital Collaboration development team and play a key role supporting the development of React based UI applications, frameworks and components.
• *ALL successful candidates for this position are required to work directly for HYR. No agencies please, Only W2**

Contractor’s Role:

Your primary goal for this job role will be designing, implementing, and supporting modern interactive UI solutions developed in JS frameworks such as ReactJS. Besides, you should be able to coordinate with Backend Developers, HTML coders, and Graphic Designers for a complete web development experience. You should be knowledgeable about packing & deploying apps via CI/CD pipelines to a cloud platform.

To succeed in this job role, you should possess excellent communication skills. You should also have the ability to keep a close eye on details. You should be able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Experience Level:

8+ years of experience as a UI/UX Developer or Web Developer

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a related field
• Complete knowledge of programming languages like CSS, HTML and Javascript
• Knowledge of website design best practices and UI/UX designs
• Well-versed knowledge in React
• Experience with state management like Redux, Zustand or similar library
• Familiarity with JavaScript module loaders and testing tools
• Familiarity with front-end build tools, such as Webpack and Module Federation
• Strong analytical skills and Excellent multitasking and organizational skills
• Ability to work in a team and under pressure
• Experience working with Cloud platforms such as MS Azure, AWS preferred

Tasks and Responsibilities:
• Using programming languages like HTML/CSS and Javascript frameworks such as ReactJs/AngularJS to create responsive web pages.
• Creating aesthetically appealing websites along with a friendly user interface design
• Following established code practices when undertaking user interface development
• Working closely with Designers and Backend Developers to ascertain client needs
• Optimizing websites, programs, and applications for better speed and functionality
• Gathering feedback from clients, technical staff and conducting troubleshooting procedures
• Developing functional documentation and guidelines for other team members
• Creating prototypes for testing website functionality
• Conceptualizing website designs and placements
• Using analytical tools to determine website performance including website speed, load time, etc.

Thanks & Regards

Namrata Ahuja | Sr. Talent Acquisition

linkedin.com/in/namrata-ahuja-0565b115b

nahuja@hyrglobalsource.com
